Class ConfidenceMethodConfig: config containing method name and settings to compute per-frame confidence scores. It includes name (max_prob or entropy), entropy_type (gibbs, tsallis, renyi), alpha parameter, entropy_norm mapping (lin, exp). Provide summary: holds configuration for confidence calculation methods, validates parameters, used in downstream scoring.

Business intent: enable flexible confidence scoring for speech recognition or token predictions, allowing selection of max probability or entropy-based measures with different entropy types and normalization.

Keywords: confidence, configuration, entropy, max probability, scaling, normalization, method selection, parameter validation.
